title: Lawson Craddock Tour de France diary: Week 2 will prove decisive and the GC ‘can change on a dime’
content:
In his latest diary, Lawson shares what it was like to climb Puy de Dome, how the mood is inside the team bus, and how team hotels are divvied up across the Tour de France.

Read the full article at Lawson Craddock Tour de France diary: Week 2 will prove decisive and the GC ‘can change on a dime’ on Velo.
